diagnosis_explanation1: The weakening of the immune system can be caused by a number of factors, including cancer treatment, bone marrow or organ transplantation, poorly controlled HIV infection / AIDS, prolonged use of immunosuppressants such as corticosteroids or drugs for rheumatoid arthritis, as well as some congenital diseases.
diagnosis_explanation10: These are heart and vascular diseases. They include, for example, heart failure, coronary artery disease, severe hypertension and other heart diseases. Please tick this answer also if you have ever had a heart attack or stroke.
diagnosis_explanation11: A person with a “probable” diagnosis is a symptomatic individual who is suspected by medical professionals to have [COVID-19] but who hasn't been tested for confirmation of whose result is inconclusive. A person with a “confirmed” diagnosis is one who has an infection that is confirmed by a test, with or without symptoms of the disease.
diagnosis_explanation2: A person is considered obese when their body mass index (BMI) is above 30.
diagnosis_explanation3: A fever means body temperature above 37.5° C or 99.5° F. Choose this symptom even if you haven’t taken your temperature but you feel feverish, inflamed or flushed.
diagnosis_explanation4: Problems with breathing and getting enough air into the lungs. They are often accompanied by tightness in the chest, shortness of breath and a feeling of suffocation.
diagnosis_explanation5: Your health condition is worsening rapidly: You feel much worse than before, e.g. an hour ago. Your symptoms persist despite your efforts.
diagnosis_explanation6: Rapid breathing: More than 20 breaths in one minute.
diagnosis_explanation7: Chronic lung diseases are disorders that affect the lungs and other parts of the respiratory system. These disorders include: chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD), moderate to severe asthma, and other lung diseases.
diagnosis_explanation8: Long-term liver disease caused by alcoholism, infections, chronic inflammation, or congenital diseases, leading to loss of liver function, cirrhosis, and other complications.
diagnosis_explanation9: Chronic kidney disease is a progressive loss of the kidneys’ ability to filter blood. It develops slowly, causing harmful waste products to accumulate in your body.

diagnosis_text43: Your symptoms are very serious and could indicate infection with coronavirus (COVID-19 disease).

diagnosis_text45: Your symptoms are worrying and may be related to the coronavirus. Call your local COVID-19 helpline. Depending on the country, it may be a helpline created by the Ministry of Health or the sanitary and epidemiological station.
diagnosis_text46: The symptoms you reported do not indicate COVID-19 disease. Still, it is better for you to stay at home until you recover. This way, you reduce the risk of infection to yourself and others. Remember that your symptoms may also result from other diseases and may require a medical consultation - the above interview is focused on COVID-19. If your symptoms seem worrying, consult a physician.
diagnosis_text47: Your responses do not indicate you have been infected with coronavirus (COVID-19 disease). Follow these preventive measures and government recommendations to avoid infection. Remember that your symptoms may also result from other diseases and may require a medical consultation - the above interview is focused on COVID-19. If your symptoms seem worrying, consult a physician.
diagnosis_text48: Your symptoms do not indicate COVID-19, but isolation is recommended for a further 10 days, following the recommendations of WHO and CDC.

exposure_notification_contact_detection_: The app has detected that you may have been exposed to the coronavirus.
This does not mean that you are infected. Please collect your medical test referral to have a health check-up performed.
Your medical test referral is available directly via the app
You can also collect it later on the app’s home screen.
exposure_notification_text_5: How do the keys and the app work?
exposure_notification_text_6: How does STOP COVID - ProteGo Safe work? What are the Keys?
exposure_notification_text_7: The main functionality of STOP COVID - ProteGO Safe is based on [B]Exposure Notification API[/B] (exposure notification module), enabling the so-called [B]Contact tracing[/B]. If the user agrees, the application uses the Bluetooth module [B]to share a randomly generated encrypted Key changed every 10 minutes[/B]. Using Bluetooth, tracing scans the environment for other devices that share similar Keys. When the contact is long enough, it saves the anonymous Device Keys. If the user is diagnosed with COVID-19 - they may voluntarily share the Keys and anonymously warn the people with whom they had contact.
exposure_onboarding_information_text1: Don't notify me of the dangers
exposure_onboarding_information_text2: It’s in your hands. This version of the application uses system tools to notify about possible contact with the coronavirus.
exposure_onboarding_information_text3: Allow the app to securely record encountering other devices. Thanks to this, when a user of one of them becomes sick, you will receive an appropriate notification. Take care of your health and the health of your loved ones.
exposure_sick_content: Take care of yourself and avoid contact with other people![BR][BR]Notify your loved ones with whom you have met recently.[BR][BR]If you don't know how to proceed, call the helpline. You will get further help there:
exposure_triage_level_high_risk_content: You have been near someone tested positive for Covid-19. You are in the High Risk Group. Please immediately call the Contact Centre of the State Sanitary Inspection:
exposure_triage_level_medium_risk_conten: Staying in the vicinity of a person tested positive for Covid-19. You are in the Medium Risk Group. Call the Contact Centre of the State Sanitary Inspectorate at 222 500 115, an employee of the helpline will guide you further.
first_diagnosis_asking_text1: Do you want to learn more?[BR]Click below and perform the risk assessment test.
first_diagnosis_asking_text3: Remember! The results of the interview are for informational purposes only. They cannot be interpreted or treated as a medical advice, consultation or diagnosis.

history_notifications_text_13: A person infected with the coronavirus has probably appeared in your environment, but it was not close and long contact. The risk that you have got infected is medium.

history_notifications_text_6: Exposure to coronavirus has not been detected.
how_it_works_10: [B]It helps protect your loved ones and friends from infection with COVID-19.[/B] If the notification makes you more caution and, for example, you decline a meeting with your family or friends, you will help limit the spread of the coronavirus.
how_it_works_12: [B]Risk Assessment Test.[/B] It is a quick health review. It assesses the risk of infection with the coronavirus on the basis of your symptoms.
how_it_works_13: [B]Health Diary.[/B] You can record there on a daily basis your temperature, the absence or presence of symptoms such as runny nose, cough, shivering and muscle pain. You can note there who you have met and where you have been. It is also helpful for health services – if you get sick, they will be able to reach people at risk of infection more quickly.
how_it_works_14: [B]COVID-19 in Poland.[/B] Shows current pandemic data (number of deaths, persons tested positive and persons who recovered).
how_it_works_15: [B]Following changes in poviats.[/B] This functionality provides you with current information about the epidemiological situation in selected regions.
how_it_works_16: [B]Warning in Europe.[/B] With this functionality, you can send a notification of possible exposure to contact with the coronavirus to users of applications in other Member States of the European Union or receive a notification from them without installing applications from other countries.
how_it_works_17: [B]Let's do everything we can to contain the spread of the coronavirus.[/B][BR][B]More information in available at[/B] [URL]www.gov.pl/stopcovid|https://www.gov.pl/stopcovid[/URL]
how_it_works_19: Why is it worth using the application, what determines its effectiveness and how to increase it?
how_it_works_2: Once installed on your phone with Bluetooth enabled, STOP COVID – ProteGO Safe searches your surroundings for other phones that also have the application installed or are using its European equivalents. If it finds any within 2 metres of reach, and if the contact with them lasts at least 15 minutes, this contact will be saved (in an encrypted manner) for 14 days.[BR][BR][B]If the phone owner with an active application is tested positive and makes this information available – users of the applications met will be notified and warned of the risk of infection with COVID–19.[/B]
how_it_works_20: Applications using the Exposure Notification technology (such as STOP COVID – ProteGO Safe) to monitor the surroundings and notify you of possible contact with a person tested positive for the coronavirus. They can thus significantly reduce the risk of spreading COVID-19. Notifications of potential contact play a particularly important role in this process. If you become more careful thanks to such a notification, e.g. you give up on meeting your family or friends – you'll help to limit the spread of the coronavirus.[BR]In addition, the app shows you how to effectively care for your health.
how_it_works_21: The application has notified me of contact with a person tested positive. What should I do?
how_it_works_22: The receipt of notification itself doesn’t mean that you’re sick. It doesn’t mean that you are subject to mandatory quarantine either.[BR]Along with the notification, you receive also tips on how to behave. Please follow them. Also, complete the risk assessment test available in the app. If the result is alarming, thanks to the application, you will quickly and conveniently sign up for a test. The application will guide you through this process. Don’t worry. We'll take care of you.
how_it_works_23: The application has notified me of contact with a person tested positive, the result of my risk assessment test is alarming. What should I do?
how_it_works_24: You can sign up for the COVID–19 test. Relevant information will be displayed on the screen of your phone after the risk assessment test has been performed. Follow the guidelines.[BR]If you decide to sign up for the test, you must consent to the transfer of your data and telephone number to the Contact Centre. The system will also ask you to call the Contact Centre. During the call, the operator of the Contact Centre will verify your data and ask about how you feel. The operator will also generate the so-called Test PIN, i.e. the number that will allow you to complete the test registration procedure. The provided Test PIN must be entered in the place in application indicated by the operator.[BR]Later on, the Contact Centre employee will ask you for your personal data to sign you up for the test and will enter them into the appropriate system. The employee will also provide you with all the information you need to complete the test. You'll be advised what to do.[BR]If you have any questions related to the registration and performance of the test, please ask them during the conversation with the Contact Centre operator.[BR]Don’t worry. We'll take care of you.
how_it_works_25: The application has notified me of contact with a person tested positive, the result of my risk assessment test is NOT alarming. What should I do?
how_it_works_26: Follow the guidelines. Perform the infection Risk Assessment Test regularly. Update your Health Diary. Stay at home or limit your contacts with others, especially with seniors.[BR]remember! Receiving such a notification doesn't mean that you’re also sick or that you’re subject to mandatory quarantine. This is just a warning about the contact with a person tested positive for coronavirus.[BR]Take care of yourself and remember to be careful!
how_it_works_27: I haven't been notified of exposure to the coronavirus but I'm tested positive, what next?
how_it_works_28: Wait for a call from the Contact Centre, you’ll be  asked if you have installed the STOP COVID – ProteGO Safe application. If you confirm that you’re using it, you‘ll be contacted by the operator (pick up calls from +48 22 306 51 69). During the call, the operator will provide you with a unique PIN number.[BR][BR]After entering the PIN number in the application – within 24 hours at the latest – a warning about possible exposure to the coronavirus will be displayed on the devices of people you have had contact with.[BR]Nobody will know who sent that warning. You also don't know who you're notifying.[BR]Note! If a few days have passed since you received a positive test result and the Contact Centre hasn't called you yet, call the Contact Centre by yourself (222 500 115). During the call, you’ll be provided with a PIN number that activates the notification system.[BR]The Contact Centre employee will instruct you where to enter this PIN in the application.
how_it_works_29: I've been using the app for a long time, so far the app hasn't sent me any notification. Does it even work?
how_it_works_30: It does. Make sure you have Bluetooth turned on. If not, turn it on.[BR]Bluetooth keeps the app running in the background. You don't have to activate it every day. The application searches your vicinity for other phones on which it is installed. If it finds such a device within a maximum of 2 metres, and the meeting is longer than 15 minutes, it'll remember it for 14 days.[BR]If during this time the person whose device met your device becomes sick – you'll receive a notification.
how_it_works_31: What can I do to contain[BR]the spread of pandemic?
how_it_works_32: Take regular risk assessment tests and complete your health diary.
how_it_works_33: Encourage your friends and loved ones to download and use STOP COVID – ProteGO Safe. The more people around you who use it, the greater the chance that if one of them becomes sick, you will get a notification together with guidelines on how to behave in such a situation and what to do.
how_it_works_4: STOP COVID - ProteGo Safe works like the equivalent applications in other EU countries – based on the Exposure Notification technology. This solution allows to monitor contacts between devices via Bluetooth. More specifically, it allows to exchange encrypted keys between devices. Such encrypted key is simply speaking an encrypted message. [B]By sharing the keys, every application user tested positive for COVID-19 anonymously warns the people they were in contact with.[/B]
how_it_works_5: The application doesn't collect or use any user data that is stored in the phone's memory. You don't need to provide personal or contact information to make it work effectively. [B]Application is completely safe.[/B]
how_it_works_7: [B]It warns you about the risk of infection.[/B] If you had contact with a person tested positive for COVID-19, you will be notified to the phone.[BR][B]NOTE![/B] Notification is anonymous. [B]Receiving notification doesn't mean that you have the coronavirus or that you need to go into quarantine. This is just a warning about the exposure to the coronavirus.[/B]
how_it_works_8: [B]Practical information and tips[/B] – the application is a source of reliable information. Along with notification about  the contact with coronavirus, it'll advise you what to do.
how_it_works_9: [B]You can easily and quickly sign up for the COVID-19 test (without the need to contact your primary care physician).[/B] If you receive a notification of contact with a person testes positive for the coronavirus and the result of your risk assessment test, provided in the application, is alarming, you’ll be able to smoothly sign up for the test.
i_am_sick_text_1: I feel unwell! What should I do?
i_am_sick_text_11: Cover your mouth and nose when coughing and sneezing. Wash hands regularly and thoroughly.
i_am_sick_text_13: We recommend that you complete the [ROUTE]Risk Assessment Test|RiskTest[/ROUTE] twice a day to monitor your symptoms.
i_am_sick_text_15: Don’t wait. Call the emergency number [PHONE]112[/PHONE] or [PHONE]999[/PHONE] and notify that you may have coronavirus.

i_am_sick_text_20: I have a referral for test
i_am_sick_text_3: If you suspect coronavirus infection, stay at home, don't go to work.
i_am_sick_text_5: By limiting contact, you help to protect others. You're also breaking the chain of infections and thus slowing the progress of the epidemic.
i_am_sick_text_6: Make an appointment at a health care facility
i_am_sick_text_7: If you have symptoms such as fever, cough or shortness of breath, [URL]use the free teleconsultation|https://pacjent.gov.pl/aktualnosc/teleporada[/URL] with a doctor.
i_am_sick_text_9: You can find a helpful tool in the [ROUTE]My Health Journal|Daily[/ROUTE] tab. Writing down the symptoms and temperature will help you and your doctor speed up the medical interview.

info_vaccinations_text_11: Call the helpline to receive the most up-to-date and reliable information on vaccination against coronavirus and sign up for vaccination.[BR][BR]The call is free of charge and the consultants work 24 hours a day, seven days a week.[BR][BR]Information is provided in four languages:
info_vaccinations_text_19: Report your willingness to get vaccinated
info_vaccinations_text_2: Vaccines are an effective and proven defence against infectious diseases.
info_vaccinations_text_20: You will receive an e-mail when the vaccination of your group will begin.
info_vaccinations_text_3: [B]You protect yourself from the risk.[/B] Vaccination is likely to protect you from infection [COVID-19] – the risk is lower by even 95%.
info_vaccinations_text_4: [B]You save the life of someone else.[/B] By getting vaccinated, you also protect others – your family members, friends, but also random people accidentally met on the street or in a shop. By getting vaccinated, you break the chain of infections. Thanks to you, the safety of other people is enhanced.
info_vaccinations_text_5: [B]You help to fight the pandemic in the world.[/B] More than 2 million people in Poland and in the world died on [COVID-19]. Each vaccinated person is potentially from a few to a dozen of people protected from infection. Vaccination of half of the population is enough to significantly reduce the risk of spreading the coronavirus.
info_vaccinations_text_6: [B]You will get back to normal life earlier.[/B] By getting vaccinated, you contribute to the lifting of restrictions earlier and to a return to normal life for all of us.

info_vaccinations_text_9: The order of vaccination is determined by the Polish National Programme of Vaccination against [COVID-19]. If the registration for vaccination of your age group has started, register below.

modal_content_text1: Are you sure you want to erase the data?
modal_content_text2: This operation cannot be undone. You will lose all history and all data provided. To continue using the application, you will have to provide your data again. In order to fully erase the data, we can move you to the system settings, where you can also erase the meeting data.
more_information_text1: [B]STOP COVID - ProteGO Safe[/B] is an application that will help us overcome the most severe restrictions related to the pandemic. The more of us will use it, the faster and more effectively we will reduce the pace and extent of the spread of the coronavirus. It is also professional help for both healthy and infected people.
more_information_text10: The privacy of the app users is our top priority. We have built STOP COVID - ProteGO Safe in accordance with, among others, the European Commission guidelines.
more_information_text11: The STOP COVID - ProteGO Safe application doesn't track users. Work on the app is fully open and transparent from the very beginning. We are aware that in order to fulfil its role, it must gain the trust of users.
more_information_text12: The application is completely safe, free of charge and voluntary.
more_information_text13: Research shows that effective isolation of the infected persons and the use of exposure notification applications (such as STOP COVID - ProteGO Safe) can reduce the risk of spreading the coronavirus by 44%. However, there is one condition - the application must be used by as many people as possible.
more_information_text15: Feel free to contact us if you have any questions: [EMAIL]protego@mc.gov.pl[/EMAIL]
more_information_text3: Our application uses an API developed by Google and Apple.
more_information_text5: The application consists of two modules. The first module is designed for self-monitoring of health condition. It's a kind of "diary" that allows you to verify on an ongoing basis whether and in what risk group you are. This solution is based on the guidelines of the World Health Organization (WHO).
more_information_text6: The second module is scanning your surroundings and will notify you in case of risk of contact with the virus.
more_information_text7: If you turn on Bluetooth on your phone, the application will communicate with other users' devices. Don't worry, it will not share with them any data about you. No one will be able to access the contents of your phone.
more_information_text8: Information about the devices encountered doesn't contain any data about their owners, it is encrypted, and is stored on the phone for two weeks only. Then it is deleted.
more_information_text9: Why is the history of such meetings useful? When one of the users, whose phone has been met by your phone, gets sick – you will receive appropriate information. You won't be notified who got sick. Instead, you will learn how to behave and what to do to take care of your health.
name_form_text1: How can the application address you?
name_form_text4: Hint: Don't use your last name.
no_changes_in_subscribed_districts_info: There have been changes regarding security in the poviats that you don't follow. The full list of poviats with division into zones is available in the application and on gov.pl.
not_supported_text2: New version of app is available.
not_supported_text3: Update the STOP COVID - ProteGO Safe application to take full advantage of all the functionalities.
notification_onboarding_information_text: Your consent to receiving notifications is required in order for the application to function properly. Click below and help STOP COVID - ProteGO Safe protect the health of us all.
Don't notify me of the dangers
onboarding_not_supported_text1: Something is wrong. Check your device - update your phone's operating system. This is necessary if you want to take full advantage of all the functionalities of the application. Updated Android devices support notifications of possible contact with the coronavirus.
onboarding_not_supported_text2: Only iPhones with iOS 13.5 and newer support notifications of possible contact with the coronavirus. Check your device - update your phone's operating system. This is necessary if you want to take full advantage of all the functionalities of the application.
pin_receiver_text_02: There are currently three ways to obtain a PIN. [B]Please select one of them.[/B]
pin_receiver_text_03: Send a text to receive a PIN. The content and target number are prepared automatically once you click the button.
pin_receiver_text_04: Send a text and receive a PIN
pin_receiver_text_05: Call the Contact Centre hotline and ask for a PIN for the STOP COVID ProteGO Safe app: [PHONE]222 500 115[/PHONE]
pin_receiver_text_06: In case you feel unwell, you do not have to do anything. A Contact Centre operator will contact you in the coming days to give you a PIN.
privacy_policy_content_text10: If your test [COVID-19] will give positive result, a Contact Centre consultant will call you to inform you about the positive result of the test. Then the Contact Centre consultant will ask you if you have the STOP COVID - ProteGO Safe application installed. If this is the case, the Contact Centre consultant will offer you to notify other Users that they have stayed near the Device of a Person Tested Positive [COVID-19] within the last 14 days, by providing you a PIN Code. The PIN Code confirms that your Device is a Device of a Person Tested Positive [COVID-19]. This confirmation is anonymous, and neither we nor other Users will be able to distinguish individual Devices and assign specific Users to them. After entering the PIN Code, the process of sending the anonymous Key to the STOP COVID - ProteGO Safe server, and then to the Devices of other Users, will be initiated in order to analyse the risk of [COVID-19] infection. Entering the PIN Code to the Device is voluntary.
privacy_policy_content_text100: Key - contains rollingPeriod, rollingStartNumber, and transmissionRisk (exact information [URL]can be found here|https://developer.apple.com/documentation/exposurenotification/entemporaryexposurekey[/URL]
privacy_policy_content_text102: information that the Key is related to the STOP COVID - ProteGO Safe application;
privacy_policy_content_text103: confirmation that the PIN Code is correct.
privacy_policy_content_text104_1: A cookie containing the User's UID, transferred to Cloudflare Inc. in order to prevent DDOS attacks and ensure the highest standards of user security. The cookie file referred to in this point does not enable profiling or monitoring of the User's behaviour on various websites (cross-site tracking). More information regarding the security of this solution is available here: [URL]https://support.cloudflare.com/|https://support.cloudflare.com/hc/en-us/articles/200170156-Understanding-the-Cloudflare-Cookies#12345682[/URL]
